title: Ep. 195 Dan Ferris: Lessons from a Great Value Investor
itunes:title: Dan Ferris: Lessons from a Great Value Investor
description:
This week, I interview Dan Ferris, editor of Extreme Value and The 12% Letter.
He shares his favorite stock ideas with our listeners.
